alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greenacres, or near Wellington, moving northwest at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Palm Springs, Atlantis, Haverhill, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Gun Club Estates, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, Palm Beach International Airport, Loxahatchee NWR, Lakeside Green, Aberdeen, Plantation Mobile Home Park, Aberdeen Golf Course, and Stacey Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
